meanings.definition: Conditions or practices conducive to maintaining health and preventing disease, especially through cleanliness.
meanings.sent1: Good hygienes, such as washing hands regularly, can help prevent illnesses.
meanings.sent2: Proper hygienes in hospitals are crucial to avoid the spread of infections.

meanings.sent4: In the battle against germs, hygienes is the knight in shining armor.
meanings.sent5: Teaching children about the importance of hygienes can have a lasting impact on their well-being.

meanings.sent1: Studying hygienes helps us understand how to keep our surroundings clean and disease-free.
meanings.sent2: Hygienes professionals play a vital role in ensuring public health standards are met.
